definitions: not clearly or distinctly visible or audible

examples.text: video projectors provided extremely blurry images

shortDefinitions: not clearly or distinctly visible or audible

definitions: unable to perceive clear or sharp images

examples.text: vision may be hazy or blurry for a few days after surgery
their eyes were blurry with tears

shortDefinitions: (of vision) unable to perceive clear or sharp images

examples.text: there's a very blurry line between art and advertising
my memories of him are blurry at best
